name: MICROPHONE_ENABLED
description:
Occurs when the microphone is enabled/disabled.Deprecated:
                    
                        This callback is deprecated as of v2.9.0. Please use the LOCAL_AUDIO_STATE_CHANGED callback:
                                LOCAL_AUDIO_STREAM_STATE_STOPPED(0).
                                LOCAL_AUDIO_STREAM_STATE_RECORDING(1).
                            
                    
                
            
            The SDK triggers this callback when the local user resumes or stops capturing the local audio stream by calling the enableLocalAudio method.

parameters.enabled:
Whether the microphone is enabled/disabled:
                                true: The microphone is enabled.
                                false: The microphone is disabled.
